title: New/emerging psychoactive substances and associated psychopathological consequences – Corrigendum
abstract: © Cambridge University Press 2019. This article was submitted to Psychological Medicine with incorrect author affiliation. 'LVRKlinikum Essen, Klinik fur Psychiatrie und Psychotherapie, University of Duisburg-Essen, Duisburg, Germany' should read 'LVR-Klinikum Essen, Klinik fur Psychiatrie und Psychotherapie, University of Duisburg-Essen, Essen, Germany'. This has been updated per the above.
